reviewText:
This computer help DVD has been designed and created for computer beginners by an experienced computer teacher and author.

Internet basics on a Windows Vista computer are carefully described and demonstrated.

This "computer class in a box" also introduces how to quickly search the Internet for information.

This DVD can be played on computers with DVD drives and on television sets with DVD players.

Internet Explorer 7 is used for the visual demonstrations.

This instructional video has been created for people who are new to computers but the "Windows Vista Survival Guide" is a recommended prerequisite.
